widget.label: Forgotten Password Verification Code Information
widget.tooltip: You requested a verification code in order to be able to change your password on your account. This form let you enter the verification code and verify it without having to follow the link we sent you.
widget.help: We offer a form that let you reset your password in the event you forget what it was. When you fill out that form and you get an email sent to you, that email includes a verification code that you have to enter here. This will allow you to enter the Forgotten Password Edit form where you will have to enter a new password.

widget.label: Verification Code
widget.tooltip: Enter your forgotten password verification code. If you did not yet receive the email we sent you, make sure to verify your spam folder in case your email provider does not like our emails.
widget.help: Enter your verification code in order to verify your email address and be allowed to your account in order to change your password.

widget.label: Verify
widget.tooltip: Once you entered your verification code click here to process the form.
widget.help: Please enter your Verification Code in the box so named and then click on the Verification button.

widget.label: Request New Code
widget.tooltip: Click here to request another forgotten password verification code
widget.help: Did not receive the verification email? Click here to request the system to send you the email again.

widget.label: Log In
widget.help: Just remembered your password? Click here to go to the log in form instead.

widget.label: Cancel
widget.tooltip: Click here to return to the home page
widget.help: Changed your mind? Click on this Cancel link to return to the home page.
